scripts.build: rimraf ./electricbastionland.zip && zip -r electricbastionland.zip css lib module templates 'electric bastionland sheets.png' package.json system.json template.json
scripts.local: npm run build && cp electricbastionland.zip ~/.local/share/FoundryVTT/Data/systems/ && cd ~/.local/share/FoundryVTT/Data/systems && unzip -o electricbastionland.zip -d electricbastionland && rm electricbastionland.zip
